headline: How The Story Around Ameris Bancorp (ABCB) Is Shifting With New Targets And Buybacks
summary: Ameris Bancorp’s latest analyst update pegs its fair value price target at US$90.07, up from US$88.83. That shift lines up with recent Street research, where higher targets are increasingly common, even as opinions still split between optimism around earnings catalysts and caution on execution and sector risks. In the sections that follow, you will see how this evolving narrative is taking shape and what to watch if you are tracking Ameris Bancorp. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Ameris...
